statements: DELETE FROM cyberbullying_reports WHERE report_type = 'Harassment' AND report_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM cyberbullying_reports WHERE report_type = 'Harassment' AND report_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM cyberbullying_statistics WHERE stat_category = 'Online' AND stat_value > 100;
DELETE FROM incidents WHERE reporter_id = 100 AND offender_id = 200;
DELETE FROM incidents WHERE reporter_id = 100 OR offender_id = 200;
DELETE FROM incidents WHERE user_id = 1 AND incident_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM trends WHERE trend_category = 'Technology' AND trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
